website_summaries.verdict: A top-tier, all-in-one zero gravity massage chair, this does everything you could need. We love the yoga stretching program feature.
pros: Customize this chair to your body type with body scan technology
Saves on space, as this chair requires only 3 inches to fully use its multiple functions
Includes five manual massage techniques, six auto programs, and heat therapy, among many others
cons: Some users report the arm wells aren't of adequate depth

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying, I only received the product today. It arrived one week early which is awesome for me. High marks for quick shipping. It took me about 2 hours to put the chair together, as I am not mechanically inclined. All in all, not too difficult to assemble. I have run through the different options now and I really like what I have seen. I can't wait to try each one out and see what I like best. I am a happy customer so far.
customer_reviews.author: Emily N. Weil

customer_reviews.title: Scam!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Broke 45 days into owning it and the manufacturer is not fixing it. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jami Nam

customer_reviews.title: Was delivered broken. Took months to have it sent ...
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered broken. Took months to have it sent back. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Did

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair 4.5 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: I researched massage chair reviews for over two months before purchasing the Realaxonchair because it was rated high and 200.00 cheaper than the Kahuna LM6800. The chair was very narrow and doesn’t have the yoga feature like this chair so we returned it and ordered this Kahuna chair and wow what a difference. This chair is pretty amazing and packed with plenty of features. The foot roller are the only issue we have because of the fact they hurt my feet. This massage chair is hands down best best chair you can buy under 2,500 point blank period! 4.5 out of 5 and a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonana

customer_reviews.title: Chair is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Chair is fantastic! The shipping process could definitely be better, it took them shipping me 3 different chairs before I got one that worked correctly. But, now that it does, I love it. Fall asleep in it all the time. I bought a wemo insight switch to see how much power it uses, and it is rather minimal, so you're electric bill isn't going to go through the roof using it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dowske

customer_reviews.title: Using the manual controls I have found that I can better focus on troubled areas than my therapist does
customer_reviews.text: This is my first massage chair, though I have tried many and have received massages from numerous therapists. I am impressed with the various settings that allow one to accommodate the sore spots. An interesting experience I have had in the short time I have been using is how it cures my headaches! I was not expecting that bonus! Using the manual controls I have found that I can better focus on troubled areas than my therapist does, since I can control the speed and timing of the massage. Great chair, great price! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bashy Bazook

customer_reviews.title: The best for your money...had it for a year and still rockin!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is as good as much more expensive chairs. We've used it daily for a year and works well still! Plus its FDA approved so you can use your HSA or FSA on it. My wife's chiropractor prescribed it for her and it's been one of the best purchases we have ever made. It's worth every penny! Seems like they have a good support/parts network which is important...plus we paid no tax and free delivery...wow!!
customer_reviews.author: kerm

customer_reviews.title: The happy place
customer_reviews.text: This has been an amazing addition. It is used daily by both my husband and I. The only complaint is I am only 5'2", I do find the back rollers go up too far and hit my skull so I have to move my head forward when they come. The yoga stretch is to die for and wish I could just keep it on stretching over and over. Totally worth every penny! We have both fallen asleep in this massage chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kab

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking chair... when I finally got it,  now some problems
customer_reviews.text: Amazon lost the chair during shipping, but finally found it a week later. Chair is nice but after 3 months it is starting to squeak badly in the feet area, and back roller sometimes catches in the lower back. I sent an email to the company, but no response yet
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: love LOVE the chair, but unhappy about the assmembly price/service
customer_reviews.text: I got this chair for my parents, AND THEY LOVE IT! The technician was great, he finished assembly in about 50 minutes. HOWEVER the window for the tech to arrive was 8AM to 11AM, but tech arrived 2PM - think it's an issue with whoever scheduled the service. ALSO, there was a last minute upcharge before he got there because of "many parts", Amazon should know this already and NOT advertise Expertise Assembly only to have an upcharge (I had driven 2 hours to get to my parents' place to be there for the assembly tech, so I was basically stuck with no choice but to accept.) ALSO the box was NOT taken.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Three stars for quality but there are many other things to cosider before buying...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good quality. Low price. Cons: 15min massage only, can't extend without cycling the chair upright first, which takes about half a minute. Does not work well for as a TV chair. Arms are too high to reach over for your beer. Heated back option has very low BTU output. Can hardly tell if it's on or not. Airbag massage may be too hard for some people. Foot roller hurts. Foot pads are now included but may not be enough for some.
customer_reviews.author: NEK SNPR

customer_reviews.title: Too aggressive for bad backs
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my brother. He has a bad back and needs something with gentler sittings and the remote control is not user friendly. The foot massage is extremely aggressive. There is a button to lessen but seems you still have to go through the cycle where you still hit it periodically. If there is a sitting to save what works for you, I couldn’t find it. There’s isnt a sitting that stays gentle on the back. We’re in different states so I thought I would be able to help him but now he’s probably had it too long. If your backs good, you can handle it. I have a cozzia and I should have bought him the same.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's 40th birthday. We both love the option for compression. It can feel a bit tight in the moment but when it releases it really does feel good. The massage feature is pretty decent but we both feel like it doesn't reach as high up on the top of the shoulders and neck region. Overall a good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I researched and researched. This is the best for the price range and I love it. I was worried at first. I purchased and scheduled delivery date thru Amazon. Delivered company called and confirmed, came as planned. It was easy to assembled. Nothing complicated and it doesn't take too much room. I love the Yoga setting which stretches you back and legs and I also enjoy the Auto very much as well. I use it every night before bed and my back pain is getting better. Overall, I'm extremely happy with the purchase. May not be as good as the $5000 one, I wouldn't know but for less than $2000, it's excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Emma P.

customer_reviews.title: A great chair if you are shorter than 5' 7"
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the chair especially for the Yoga Stretching. Unfortunately, I am 5' 10" and the chair is not able to stretch me because the legs are simply a spring loaded extension. A rather large oversight by the company or perhaps they are not concerned with selling a product that works for most American men. So if you are taller than 5' 7" I would recommend finding a different chair if the Yoga Stretching is high on your reasons to buy a massage chair.
customer_reviews.author: Tim V

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely happy with the chair
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with the chair. It looks good and doesn't take up a lot of room. Very comfortable and functions as described. They kept me informed by email and phone of the delivery. Delivery driver was very nice. It took my husband and a friend less than an hour to bring it inside and put the arms on. I was enjoying a massage within an hour! Very good value for the price. It's quiet and has a good variety of massage options. I really enjoy the heated option. I have sensitive feet so I kept some of the foam padding to put in the foot area. It works great. I would recommend this chair to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this chair. It is pretty much what was advertised and agrees with the reviews on Amazon. Delivery was on time to my garage and I moved it inside by myself. Assembly was a bit tricky on getting the sides in correctly, and I had to call because an air tube had displaced in shipment. Customer service handled this with a simple phone call. This chair does all the more expensive chairs do. The back massage is good and as firm as you need it. The Yoga feature actually stretches your spine. So far very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hallberg

customer_reviews.title: Product quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product is good but definitely needs more padding in the seat and over feet rollers. Everything so far is working good and was easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Bergen

customer_reviews.title: Reclining feature broke within after less than 2 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: I liked this chair so much. I was hoping it would last 5 years. Now that this part has broken I can't even sit in it it is so uncomfortable. No way to get it fixed either. CHOOSE ANOTHER BRAND WITH A LONGER WARRANTY.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great massage chair for someone with back pain!
customer_reviews.text: So extremely pleased with this massage chair! I have terrible neck and back pain and this chair makes me feel a lot better. I sit in it practically everyday!!! The only thing that I do not like is that after the timer is up, you have to turn off the chair and turn it back on. So watch your time by setting a timer on your phone!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P

customer_reviews.title: My wife LOVES this chair!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a high stress job and has back and neck pain and just general stress tight muscles. She is in great physical shape but as we age things sometimes hurt. Got this as a present for her and she loves it! (ok I do too) Lots of different settings to get the type of massage you want. I am partial to the Yoga setting which is a relaxing massage/stretch. One tip. I put some heavy socks on the foot pads. The foot massage can be rather intense. That cushions it a bit and definitely helps. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had one years ago!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is wonderful. Other reviews make note about it being a bit hard on the feet and it pushes the arms out. This is mostly true. I put a towel down for extra padding on the feet. The first week was a bit uncomfortable, but know I use it between 2-4 times a day Great to get the blood flowing first thing in the morning. Great after working on an assembly line all day. The yoga setting is also wonderful. I use one setting then the other setting back to back.
customer_reviews.author: WEBSLINGER

customer_reviews.title: Oh-Emm -Gee!!!!  I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is EVERYTHING! The Kahuna massage chair owes me nothing. Easy to assemble. Took 35 minutes. Used the YouTube video for setup. Outstanding! The controls are easy to work. Others said the foot rollers were to much but I found them perfect for me as I like a lot of pressure. Fits nicely in a corner of my bedroom. Not too big, not too small. Quiet enough for what it has to do. I use it daily... THIS IS A GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Briana's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I have already broken even with cost savings using ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair based on reviews only, believing it could supply way more instant value than human touch would cost me to orchestrate over time — And I was right. I feel like I have already broken even with cost savings using this fantastic chair vs human touch. It’s quiet. It’s strong. Good value. Yoga stretch+
customer_reviews.author: garyz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice massage chair! It is very versatile... There are 5 Auto programs plus an additional Yoga setting that is very nice. The foot massage is very firm, but that's what my wife and I like. You can disable the foot massage at any time. The heating function is awesome! I also really like the space-saving aspect! Overall, I think this chair is a great value at this price point! Also, it was very easy to assemble while watching the Youtube video along with the included instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, only delivery needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do - giving a pretty good massage. It still won't match up to the acuity of a human touch but still relieves pain points on shoulders and neck, especially the tailbone only L track can cover. Even compared to Kahuna's own higher-end line-up, this still is the best bang for the buck. My only disappointment was the delivery. I would expect at least two men to be delivering a 100-pound massage chair; only one man came. I ended up badly bruising my hand prevent the heavy box from falling over him. But overall, it's been a little less than a month and the product is pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.author: U,p

customer_reviews.title: Kahuna Message Chair is Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the chair and use it daily. Have back issues and the chair is extremely effective in easing the pain. It did take some time to figure out how to make adjustments. Did have a small mix-up at delivery as the directions made me think a part was missing. Spoke first with Amazon and the representative was understanding and helpful. Had to wait until after the weekend to speak with Good Price who explained how to connect the tubes without the additional part mentioned in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good massage chair. I love the space saving feature, it doesn't take up very much room at all. Gives a very good massage. Excellent chair at this price point. Works well for us, we are 5'10 and 6'2. (Our 4'11" daughter is small for it, though benefits from all parts except the shoulder airbags. Only thing I wish this did have is the airbags at the hips. But...otherwise, it is a great chair, and I (and my husband) highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Chair is smaller than expected. I am not a very big man. 5’11 190lbs. The width of the chair is tight. My friend is a bigger guy 6’1 225lbs and it was tight for him. The length of the chair is not enough for me. My knees are bent up even in the position where the chair is in full extension. Disappointing because the quality is good with decent options. This would be great for someone under 5’8”.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C

customer_reviews.title: Chair is great. I looked for a while before I found ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair is great. I looked for a while before I found one that seamed the most reliable and this was it. It is my first massage chair and now idk how I could live without one. It is my go to seat in the living room and if I'm busy and getting up and sitting down for just a few minutes I just put it on back rollers so I can get up and down without running through a program. But if I have Time I love the Yoga program.
customer_reviews.author: James Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.  Horrible installation instructions & parts explanation.
customer_reviews.text: The chair is amazing. If you didnt have to put it together... its 10 stars. But there was a loose screw in one of the side panels. Had to shake it out. Gave up but while installing it finally fell out. Of course by then i thought it was a broken part. Then they say to connect the air tubes. But the problem is they have two connectors already in place so you have to remove one. And finally, they don’t provide an allen wrench to tighten the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Nosh

customer_reviews.title: No more personal massage appointments
customer_reviews.text: I have used this chair now for several months, and I love it. The only issue I have is the rollers on the feet hurt. Needs more padding in the bottom where feet go. The difference massage selections are wonderful. I have fibromyalgia, and the soreness/pain from it, often makes it so I don't sleep well, so when I get that bad, I get up and get in this chair, and let it massage me to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Back saver, neck saver, and MORE!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome massage from hips up to the head, Or just the exact part or spot that needs a massage. It has saved my husband and I from going to chiropractor weekly. It has several choices with heat being one of them. The chair is very comfortable. I recommend this massage chair. The customer service with the warranty company is the best! Joon contacted me until the issue was resolved. I always felt confident with his service. We will never be without a massage chair!
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Good Value For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This chair seems to be well built and a good value for the money. It's a good investment for personal therapy
customer_reviews.author: Delon Grayot

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is like having a full time masseuse live in your house, ready to give your muscles a quick pick me up at any time.. the only problem with the chair is that you will never want to leave it and will have to fight your friends and family for who gets to sit in it next.. I am 6’3 and chair fits me perfectly, and even though it’s not the most aesthetically pleasing chair, it will quickly become an indispensable part of your family
customer_reviews.author: jeff friedman

customer_reviews.title: The very best Massage Chair
customer_reviews.text: I have now owned this chair for a year and it is absolutely the best chair. I use it twice a day and my entire body feels so much better. I play a lot of tennis and it really helps me prep and recover. If you are over 6’ 1”, you will find it too small for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler V. Grady

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh....this chair!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY reason there are 4 stars instead of 5 is because that fifth star will be the longevity test. I've had this chair a little over a month and love it. It has alleviated problems I was having with my knees (!) because those problems originated in my back and calves.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made for small people
customer_reviews.text: Can just fit shoulder width. Once message starts inflation at shoulder is either painful and or pushes you out of that part of the chair. Leg area is way too small. Same issue with Caves. Pushes you out of that part. Foot message can only be tolerated with slippers on.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie

customer_reviews.title: and she's mad she spent that much $ ) She sat in my chair and enjoyed a massage and said it's no better than hers
customer_reviews.text: I almost spent twice the money on a floor show model at the KC home show. (My friend did, and she's mad she spent that much $ ) She sat in my chair and enjoyed a massage and said it's no better than hers! I'am enjoying the massage benefits. I use it daily. the chair is very nice looking, it was relatively easy for my husband to put together. The company had it packed very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome chair for the price and the quality is great. So comfortable even when it finishes I just lay there in the zero gravity mode.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great after sales service!
customer_reviews.text: I faced a similar problem to a previous customer. The electronic board gave out after 6 months. Thankfully, William at AJX was very helpful and shipped a new board to me immediately with detailed instructions on how to swap the boards out. I was operational in less than an hour! Many thanks, William!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time for a masssge chair and finally decided on this one and I’m extremely happy with my decision. It feels like a chair that costs upwards of $5,000 and made so well. It feels amazing from head to toe. I couldn’t be more happy with my purchase. We’ll worth the $1,899.00 I paid for it. I highly recommend this chair. This is the first review I’ve ever made on a product but this massage chair does everything it says and I feel so relaxed when I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy R.

customer_reviews.title: Want your legs and feet tortured?  This is the product for you.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" and 250lbs, i cannot fully extend in the legs. This chair is a torture machine for my legs. Once the calf section is inflated you cannot remove your legs without serious effort and the intensity even set at low is WAY too much. Same goes for foot massage, way too intense and no way i can figure out to make lighter. Most times i do not put my legs in the chair, just hurts too much. Too Skinny in the shoulder area for a big guy. Heat works well and back to buttocks massage is good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa v.

customer_reviews.title: Best value. High quality chair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 2-massage chairs prior to this purchase ranging 1.5-2x the price of this chair. This chair is superior in quality, craftsmanship and comfort to the other two chairs. With high usage, I’ve seen the parts that typically fail and have rebuilt each chair with warranty parts. Upon arrival I inspected the usual suspects and this chair has superior components. my chairs usually need to be replaced every 3-4 years so it makes sense to buy at mid range price point. I’m very happy to have this chair at the low end price point with a very good warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Get one !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair !! Assembly was a little confusing. Read the manual. The chair itself is awesome. Very quiet. Go get one and feel like new
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Kahuna LM 6800. It’s very comfortable and comes with Auto, Yoga, and Manual mode. Yoga is really good after a long day at work standing. Auto mode covers whole body without muscle stretch. Manual comes in handy when you want to focus on one section of the body. It’s pretty quiet and doesn’t take up lots of space, which is perfect for my home. I just wish the installation could be easier (took us about 45 mins to assemble). Overall it’s an awesome massage chair for it’s price.
customer_reviews.author: chanvs

customer_reviews.title: The chair is awesome and the customer service is excellent
customer_reviews.text: The chair is awesome and the customer service is excellent. The chair is so ridiculously comfortable, I fall asleep in it. The yoga stretch with heat on is the perfect mode and I am really pleased with the chair. The customer support is also top notch. They respond to emails and phone calls right away and helped me understand all the settings and more to get the best use out of the chair. Thank you to all the Amazon verified purchasers that recommended this item. You were right, and I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: dwlima

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ok...I love this chair. It has a variety of massage programs and is a good intensity of pressure. The leg massage does hit my calves a bit strangely and the foot rollers are way too intense (I put a towel down to soften it,) but I am very happy with the chair.
customer_reviews.author: kristin amundson

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best chair for the money . After reading all the reviews . It is the best for the buck . 1000 more gets you a speaker, and a stand for the controller , Have it in use very day by one of the family . So far all agree it was a very good investment . ONLY Con the controller needs to be put in some type of stand . We have adapted a selfie stick for this .
customer_reviews.author: Jim Calle

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: if you want your own personal massager, without to deal with socail interaction, the drive, the tips, the oil. this thing is the best thing. it will make the money back for you if you use it everyday. high quality and comfortable. Best thing to do is to lay down and let it do its work, your stress will go away after a long day at work.
customer_reviews.author: jack chan

customer_reviews.title: NOPE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I give this 0 stars!!!!! I had it professionally assembled. It worked for about an hour. My wife went to use it and it started making the most loud, horrific banging noise. It wouldn't raise from reclining. I unplugged it. Plugged ii back in and still doing it. Had it picked up on the 27th for return as they said they CAN NOT exchange it therefore I would have to order it again. Have yet to receive my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Jones

customer_reviews.title: Weird installation manual but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Chair came extended instead of up right. Making it difficult to follow the already limited instructions. 2 hours later the chair is set up and its amazing
customer_reviews.author: tamyramensah

customer_reviews.title: It is an OK massage chair
customer_reviews.text: It massages the back and buttock area well. But it hurts the bottom of the feet since it is too strong. It is too loud for Yoga and Zero gravity. For almost $2000, it has no pocket to store the control. The control keeps falling off. When the power stops, the machine does not lower down.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Now need help
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for 2 years It now needs service. Lost my paper work Who can I call? Awesome chair We use it. 2 to 3 times a day
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Donate

customer_reviews.title: Love it, perfect massage chair and great to nap ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, perfect massage chair and great to nap on during. Super heavy but wheels on the bottom to push around. Hubby put it together in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Massage Chair, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents, they are really enjoying it. I get to enjoy it from time to time myself...considering getting one for myself now.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, excellent results.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my wife. She uses the chair daily. She loves the chair and the excellent massage therapy it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased kahuna LM6800 and it is worth it. we use it everyday, My husband is 5’1 and he fits just fine, the massage is very powerful, He likes the manual massage, and I’m 5’ and thin I like the yoga massage because I’m too short so the machine don’t reach the foot roller but if its yoga it reach my feet, the arm air massage can’t reach my hands too but it’s fine, all in all it is a great purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Wifey01

customer_reviews.title: It looks just like the photo once you put it together
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying this chair. We have had it for about 2 months. It looks just like the photo once you put it together. There are quite a few parts. The directions are not as clear as they could be, but we were able to get it together in about 30 minutes. We like all of the different massage levels. My one point to make is that the leg area squeezes quite tight. There must be a way to adjust this, but it isn't clear.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Blessing for chronic back pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a blessing for my chronic back pain. Great value for the price. The chair is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Stark

customer_reviews.title: I now have full time massage therapist sitting with me.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Im 6'2" and it doesnt fit perfect with my legs..just slighly bent..no biggie. Saved hundreds of $ already from using this instead of getting a massage by a person A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: Toyhaven

customer_reviews.title: Good chair at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I got the chair and unpacked it and found it relatively easy to assemble. It is best to go on line and find the video to help. The instruction sheet is pretty bad.. Putting the arms on it is better to make bigger holes in the cover to get the screws through. I was short one bolt but easy a hardware srore to get one. It took about one hour or so to get the chair unboxed and up and running . The chair is great. Does a good job and as good as more expensive ones I have tested.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.Kemp

customer_reviews.title: sure takes the kinks out.
customer_reviews.text: i don't like the foot massager that's me, but everything else is great, it will sure take the kinks out.
customer_reviews.author: david kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Chair to relaxation
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I set our own chair up after watching the YOUTUBE video. Very easy. We love the chair and the overall massage. I wish the remote was a little more user friendly, but perhaps with time it will become easier. If the chair lasts like they say it will, it is well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was not as easy as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bolting on, air hose connections that were not clear in the assembly guide, and my back heater does not work.
customer_reviews.author: BeCarefulWhatUAsk4

customer_reviews.title: Very nice massage chair.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! I especially like the yoga stretch mode, it helps to alleviate my back pain due to herniated discs. I use this chair almost daily and it has met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R.

customer_reviews.title: Superb product along with a great customer service....
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a back-saver. I feel so rejuvenated after one year of using it. I am actually looking forward to a nice after work massage session in this chair. I would highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a good and reliable massage chair with lots of extra features to select from. BTW, the customer service and their warranty is superb.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great massage chair for the money. Customer support has been terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome full body massage chair
customer_reviews.text: I love the Kahuna Massage Chair. It gives a full body massage at different levels of intensity with a full range of settings. This chair far exceeds my old massage chair of the past fourteen years. This chair is not for sissy's!!
customer_reviews.author: BC Reader

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it and uses it all the time!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this after considerable research. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Weir

customer_reviews.title: But I love the chair
customer_reviews.text: Instructions not adequate. But I love the chair. Best investment of the year. It has more programs than advertised. Company did not inform me I could have paid a little extra to have the delivery person put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Chap

customer_reviews.title: The chair requires some muscle to get in the door ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair requires some muscle to get in the door and set up, so have some help around when it arrives. It works as advertised and has been very therapeutic for my wife, we are seasoned citizens. Had a problem with one of the air bladders in an arm, it was resolved quickly by Eric at the company new part was shipped in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Storey

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. I use it every single day. Just in case I am 6 foot 240 former competing body builder fits me great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair from a  Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Chair. We are very happy we ordered this massage chair. Great functions and looks great too. I'm very happy with the seller. They responded immediately to my email and answered my questions.
customer_reviews.author: ajs2000

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just what I needed to loosen up and stay limber. Love the yoga and chiro functions.
customer_reviews.author: Formerly Sweet Polly

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! Very relaxing. The only drawback is the pressure might be a little too much for some, on the pre-set sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Camp

customer_reviews.title: Best Chair Ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Wonderful ! I would buy it again -- Works fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my best investments !
customer_reviews.text: This massage chair is definitely one of my best investments. My family and I love this chair and wish we had purchased it sooner. This chair does wonders for my upper and lower back, and my family love the foot and neck massage. I'm amazed at how many features this chair has, when compared to more expensive chairs.
customer_reviews.author: howard dudley

customer_reviews.title: Air lines problems
customer_reviews.text: Broke 3 times in one year...nice chair but dont hold good...air lines disconect multiple times....leg heater wire broken. Do not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hrado

customer_reviews.title: ... weeks so far ill give it 5 stars gives great body massage foot massage is pretty rough use two ...
customer_reviews.text: i had it for two weeks so far ill give it 5 stars gives great body massage foot massage is pretty rough use two small toles on feet roolers that make it just about right
customer_reviews.author: steven a long

customer_reviews.title: Awesome massage chair
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this massage chair. The yoga feature stretches you out and my sciatica pain has subsided. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TJ219

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research this is the best bang for your buck, take your time with assembly and start the screws by hand. There is a YouTube video to follow. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: The Zegil’s

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, works great. My brother has a chair that cost more than twice as much, and I think this one is just as satisfying. With 6 different default programs, different members of the family have different favorites. We particularly like the L track technology.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER J DYSART

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. I read a few reviews that complained about the assembly but I found it to be very simple and with a couple tools and an ability to read some simple instructions it was together in less that an hour including the unpackaging. As soon as I plugged it in my life changed. I'd give it more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This chair is totally awesome I had a bad lower back pains after using ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is totally awesome I had a bad lower back pains after using it just a few times my back feels a lot better I recommend this chair to anyone customer service was awesome I give it five stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customizable chair
customer_reviews.text: Customizable chair. Good quality. A bunch of relatives tried it during a family reunion and it worked great. A free aunts justunder 5' tall felt that they are too small for the feet and legs portion of the chair. I usually just use the yoga or other auto functions. Sometimes I do a spot massage.
customer_reviews.author: Thai

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!  Thorough massage with lots of features!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. It has great massaging pressure and had a lot more features than our previous chair. Love the zero gravity feature, and the heated massage. Good Value for the purchase price! It can fit into a small space. I’m so glad we bought this brand!
customer_reviews.author: ScapbookMom

customer_reviews.title: Set it up where you will use it.
customer_reviews.text: It is not as easy to set up as it appears on Youtube. But once working, it is a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Cooley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: High quality affordable chair
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an affordable high quality massage chairs for years and finally find one from Good Price World. So far everything works very well and I am very happy about the product and service from Good Price World.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Chair !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research, and we felt this chair was the best choice for the money. The chair is as good as advertised, we love it. Highly recommend !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: Don want it like that
customer_reviews.text: The item is defective, has a ripped side as I pull it out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Efren garcia

customer_reviews.title: They stand behind their products
customer_reviews.text: Came and did not work. They sent me another remote and board. Put the board in and it worked. Great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: dean bottorf

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I initially had some issues with the product due to defective part but the customer service was very prompt and excellent at resolving the issue. The massage chair is not as strong as i would like, maybe because I'm used to getting very strong massages at the shops but I guess it does the job for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the chair
customer_reviews.text: I have had the chair for 4 mos and I love the chair. My wife and I both use it for a massage as well as to get kinks/knots out when we have upper back and/or shoulder pain, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jatinder S. Nijjar

customer_reviews.title: we made the best decision ever
customer_reviews.text: We've been shopping for a massage chair for a while. Hands down, we made the best decision ever. It meets our needs and price point. People here complain about the foot rollers but I've gotten used to it, it's quite relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty much as expected and seems to be very high ...
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty much as expected and seems to be very high quality. Directions for assembly lack detail but steer you in right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley W.

customer_reviews.title: I like the chair
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair, directions were really not great. The legs squeeze a little too hard, wondering if there is any way to adjust that. I do enjoy the different message settings. Overall I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: amber langheinrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great massage chair for the price. I did not have to pay a lot to enjoy the same quality and function.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Our family has been using this product for several months now. We use it almost daily and think it offers an excellent value for the money. As other reviewers already noted, we thought the foot rollers were a little too hard. But we lined them with some foam and that solved the problem. The assembly was not overly challenging. It took my husband about one hour to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: The Stuff of Dreams
customer_reviews.text: OMG better than I ever could have imagined. I cry a little every time I have to leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M.

product_meta.title: Zero Gravity Full-Body Kahuna Massage Chair Recliner LM6800 with Yoga & Heating Therapy (Brown)
feature_bullets: 11/22/19 New Amazon Exclusive Promotion- 2 Years additoinal warranty included - Total 3 Years Parts & Labor, 4th year parts and 5th year structual warranty. 04/11/19 - Arm Airbag has new design, 6 Auto programs, timer button up to 30 minutes, Double layer shoulder airbags - Extra foot padding and remote holder included.

Happy to Introduce LM-6800, one of the most popular real massage chair that can start your day fresh with Kahuna massage chair! Installation Video on youtube.com - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FCrzUzZiXtE . You can download new manual and register warranty online at Kahunachair official website. Please contact us directly for any issues or troubles, we will be happy to assist you.

L-Track massage system, 3 stages of Zero Gravity, Smart body scan technology scans your body to detect your body size for individual custom fit massage. Air massage technology covers entire body, LM-6800 has 6 different auto programs including special yoga stretching programs for full body stretching, dual foot rollers on the feet area, Space saving technology only requires 3 inches from the wall. Without this technology your arm will not get a decent massage.

Best warranty service for online massage chair company – Easy to register warranty and request service. Kahuna LM-6800 gives limited warranty for 3 years. We offer warranties for all parts, labor and structural framework of the chair. We guarantee that your qualified product will be repaired. This Kahuna Massage Chairs for residential use only. It is a non-transferable warranty. First year covers all parts and labor cost. Customers do not pay anything during first year warranty period
Footer Area has dual foot rollers and detachable & washable footer area cotton for sanitary purpose. Top recommended massage chair on amazon with customer reviews. FDA Registered as medical Device.
